items.title: Born in the Dark: The Catastrophic Collapse of Fuzzy Dark Matter Solitons as the Origin of Little Red Dots
items.summary: arXiv:2601.00044v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: JWST surveys have uncovered a population of compact, red sources ("Little Red Dots," LRDs) at $z \ge 5$ that exhibit broad Balmer emission yet remain X-ray faint, implying heavy obscuration with $N_H \ge 10^{24}$ cm$^{-2}$. We propo…

items.title: A free-floating-planet microlensing event caused by a Saturn-mass object
